review: I was taking elavil and was arguing with my spouse and I had one beer. I took two 25 mg. Pills and about 10 hours later I woke up in hospital to be told I was found wandering next to the freeway with no shirt and no shoes.  I had no recollection of anything from after about 20 minutes after taking medication.  Absolutely nothing   Beware!!

I have bipolar disorder and currently taking 10mg Amitryptiline along side my mood stabiliser of 500mg Seroquel XR. I started this medicine when I was having a depressive episode and it has worked wonders for me. I have been on Sertraline, Venlafaxine, Fluoxetine, Escitalopram, and Mirtazapine. This is the only anti depressant that has worked for me.
